alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Kershaw; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:57PM EDT until September 07 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Lexington County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Richland County in central South Carolina... South central Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 557 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from West Columbia Riverwalk to near SC State Farmer`s Market to 7 miles southwest of Gaston, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Columbia, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, McEntire Air Base, St. Andrews, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Arcadia Lakes, Eastover, Congaree National Park, Hopkins, Horrel Hill, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Sandy Run, and Fort Jackson. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 26 between mile markers 111 and 135. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
